SEARCH
Package source.Database.Dao

Interface SuggestionDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuggestionDaoImpl
public interface SuggestionDao
The SuggestionDAO interface provides operations that follow the CRUD operations for persistent data storage. Also provides a method to get an entire list of suggestions and delete them.
Since:
11/19/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Method Details

    • createSuggestion

      boolean createSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
      Creates a suggestion in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      suggestion - the suggestion to add
      Returns:
      true if managed to create, false if not

    • readSuggestion

      Suggestion readSuggestion(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads a suggestion from the subsequent database using the suggestion name
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      a suggestion object if found, null if not.

    • readSuggestion

      Suggestion readSuggestion(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads a suggestion from the subsequent database using the suggestion name MUST SATISFY ALL THE QUERIES
      Parameters:
      queries - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      a suggestion object if found, null if not.

    • readSuggestions

      ArrayList<Suggestion> readSuggestions(DatabaseQuery query)
      Reads all suggestions that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of suggestions if found, an empty list if not.

    • readSuggestions

      ArrayList<Suggestion> readSuggestions(DatabaseQuery[] queries)
      Reads all suggestions that satisfies a particular property. NOTE: List can be empty if no results are found
      Parameters:
      queries - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      an arraylist of suggestions if found, an empty list if not.

    • updateSuggestion

      boolean updateSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
      Updates a suggestion in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      suggestion - the suggestion to add
      Returns:
      true if managed to update, false if not

    • deleteSuggestion

      boolean deleteSuggestion(DatabaseQuery query)
      Deletes a suggestion in the subsequent database
      Parameters:
      query - query to check in our header
      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

      boolean deleteSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)

      Returns:
      true if managed to delete, false if not

    • getSuggestions

      ArrayList<Suggestion> getSuggestions()
      Function to get the list of all suggestion objects if needed
      Returns:
      the list of suggestion stored in the database

    • refresh

      void refresh()
      Function to refresh the database by saving this context and then reading it again.
